definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 里德说，有时候信息的缺乏会让员工误以为老板偏心。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I'm a fish on the band .
sentences.chinese: 有时候，我也是一条岸上的小鱼儿。

sentences.english: Occasionally, by now, Is lipped and called him Scampy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我说漏嘴，也叫它“小淘气”。

sentences.english: The dirt roads were, at times, impassible because of the heavy tropical rains.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，热带暴雨让泥路无法行走。

sentences.english: Sometimes, he gets so sulky that he just stays in his tent and fasts.
sentences.chinese: 有时候他就只会呆在自己的帐篷里不吃东西生闷气。

sentences.english: I drink milk and have an egg, sometimes I will have meat porridge.
sentences.chinese: 我喝牛奶和吃一个鸡蛋，有时候喝肉粥。

sentences.english: Sometimes you can almost see the plan.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，你似乎可以知道哪些冥冥之中的注定。

sentences.english: Occasionally, however, standards of poultry welfare must be safeguarded by legislation.
sentences.chinese: 然而有时候家禽福利标准必须由立法来保障。

sentences.english: Sometimes trying to find something on the worldwide web is like trying to find a needle in a haystack.
sentences.chinese: 有时候在互联网上找东西就和大海捞针一样难。

sentences.english: Results sometimes you study the performance of the test.
sentences.chinese: 成绩有时候是对你学习的好坏的检验。

sentences.english: The bus sometimes stops at a drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 有时候这巴士停留在简易餐馆。

sentences.english: As difficult as it may be at times, try not to take negative feedback personally.
sentences.chinese: 回复时尽可能不牵动个人情绪，虽然有时候很难做到。

sentences.english: Upward revaluation of currency is sometimes disbenefit to our company.
sentences.chinese: 货币升值有时候对我们的公司没有好处。

sentences.english: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them. (C.Weizmann)
sentences.chinese: 奇迹有时候是会发生的，但是你得为之拼命的努力。

sentences.english: But at times, and especially at first, the brain does this work clumsily.
sentences.chinese: 但有时候，尤其是刚开始时，大脑并不擅长做这些。

sentences.english: Sometimes I'm afraid I'll just go to pieces .
sentences.chinese: 有时候我真担心我会彻底垮下来。

definition: usually/in many cases/more often than not
